info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:12AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT THE AREA THROUGH 245 AM EDT... At 211 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from East Palestine to 6 miles east of Lisbon to near Wellsville. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... East Liverpool, Beaver Falls, East Palestine, Wellsville, Ellwood City, New Brighton, Calcutta, Rochester, Slippery Rock, Ohioville, Industry, New Waterford, Patterson Township, Big Beaver, New Beaver, Salineville, West Mayfield, Ellport, Prospect, and Plain Grove Township. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 20. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 93 and 106. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 18 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
